attributes.action: Include locations of latest Coronavirus cases daily. Once a week is not enough!
attributes.background:
Tell the public where the latest Coronavirus cases are.

Once per week is simply not enough.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Chief Medical Officer has confirmed that daily updates will continue.

You can read his remarks during an appearance before the Health Select Committee at https://committees.parliament.uk/work/81/preparations-for-coronavirus/publications/
